data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_158209b180032c4564b8f3bde8c48888.png

skilllist.skilldesc: After traveling 5 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot Crit), briefly slows the target by 80% and reduces their Physical Defense by 10(+1*Hero Level) for 3s (up to 2 stacks).

Chou strikes in the target direction, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit. This skill can be cast 3 times before it goes on cooldown. On the 3rd cast, Chou also knocks enemies hit airborne.

Hitting an enemy hero with the 3rd cast resets the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Shunpo</font>.
Chou charges in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity and a 200<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield.

Chou strikes a roundhouse kick at the target enemy hero, dealing them 400<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and knocking them back.

Cast the skill again to chase up the target, dealing a total of 480<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

data.name: Chou

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Balanced burst damage and CC. Good at single-target eliminations.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: Fire Flux Esports Alien
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A talented fighter with a heart of chivalry.

assist.desc: Chou works best with Healers that can boost his survivability and speed, such as Angela and Rafaela.

strong.desc: Chou counters slower Fighters like Terizla and Alpha that have a hard time dealing with his quick hit and run tactics.

weak.desc: Chou is countered by heroes with very long-range like Lesley and Pharsa that can take out a chunk of his HP before he can get close.
